toaster_mode.title: üçû Toaster Mode (Low-End PCs)
toaster_mode.description: Uses Canvas 2D rendering instead of WebGL for maximum compatibility
toaster_mode.help: Optimized for weak systems and maximum compatibility
toaster_mode.tip: Use Toaster Mode if your PC slows down during fireworks or if you experience rendering issues in OBS.

presets.title: Presets
presets.description: Choose a preset based on your system's performance. Use the Benchmark to find the optimal settings.
presets.tip_text: Use the Benchmark tab to automatically determine the best 2 presets for your system.

benchmark.title: Performance Benchmark
benchmark.description: Run an automatic performance test to find the optimal settings for your system.
benchmark.info_text: The benchmark opens the OBS overlay window and runs various scenarios. This takes about 1-2 minutes. Do not close the window during the test.
